properties.script:
out0 = spark.sql(f"""
    SELECT
  '{Config.sourceSystem}'  AS SRC_SYS_CD,
  f4311_adt.pddoco AS PO_NUM,
  f4311_adt.pdlnid AS PO_LINE_NBR,
  f4311_adt.pdkcoo AS CO_CD,
  f4311_adt.pddcto AS PO_TYPE_CD,
  NULL AS DEL_IND,
  TRIM(f4311_adt.pdlitm) AS MATL_NUM,
  TRIM(f4311_adt.pdmcu) AS PLNT_CD,
  TRIM(f4311_adt.pdlocn) AS SLOC_CD,
  TRIM(f4311_adt.pdvr01) AS INTRNL_REF_NUM,
  CAST(TRIM(f4311_adt.pduorg) AS DECIMAL(18, 4)) AS PO_LINE_QTY,
  TRIM(f4311_adt.pduom) AS PO_UOM_CD,
  NULL AS STK_TYPE_CD,
  NULL AS DELV_CMPLT_IND,
  TRIM(f4311_adt.pdlnty) AS LINE_ITEM_TYPE_CD,
  NULL AS ACCT_ASGNMT_CAT_CD,
  NULL AS PRIN_PRCH_AGMT_NUM,
  NULL AS PRIN_PRCH_AGMT_LINE_NUM,
  TRIM(f4311_adt.pdan8) AS DELV_ADDR_NUM,
  NULL AS GR_LEAD_TIME_DAYS_QTY,
  NULL AS SPL_STK_IND,
  NULL AS CNFRM_CD,
  NULL AS SUBCNTRC_IND,
  NULL AS PR_NUM,
  NULL AS PR_LINE_NBR,
  NULL AS BRAZILIAN_NCM_CD,
  NULL AS OUTB_DELV_CMPLT_IND,
  NULL AS ISU_SLOC_CD,
  TRIM(f4311_adt.pdshan) AS CUST_NUM,
  TRIM(f4311_adt.pdmcu) AS SHIPPING_PT_NUM,
  NULL AS EM_MATERIAL_CODE,
  NULL AS BASE_UOM,
  TRIM(f4311_adt.pduom) AS PO_PRICE_UOM,
  CAST(TRIM(f4311_adt.pdprrc) AS DECIMAL(18, 2)) AS PO_LINE_PRICE,
  NULL AS DOCUMENT_CURRENCY_GROSS_AMOUNT,
  NULL AS DOCUMENT_CURRENCY_NET_AMOUNT,
  NULL AS NUMRTR_FOR_CONV_ORDR_UNIT,
  NULL AS DENOM_FOR_CONV_ORDR_UNIT,
  NULL AS PRICE_UNIT,
  f4311_adt.pdsfxo AS ORDER_SUF,
  CASE WHEN LOWER(TRIM(f4311_adt.pdtrdj)) = 'null' OR TRIM(f4311_adt.pdtrdj) = '' OR TRIM(f4311_adt.pdtrdj) = '0' THEN NULL 
  ELSE to_timestamp(substr(CAST(date_add(concat(substr(CAST(CAST(TRIM(f4311_adt.pdtrdj) AS INT) + 1900000 AS STRING),1,4),'-01-01'), CAST(substr(CAST(CAST(TRIM(f4311_adt.pdtrdj) AS INT) + 1900000 AS string),5) AS INT )-1) AS STRING), 1, 10),'yyyy-MM-dd')
  END AS PO_LINE_DTTM,
  TRIM(f4311_adt.pdpqor) as PRMRY_QTY_ORD,
  NULL as G_L_ACCT_NUM,
  NULL as PRCHSNG_DOC_CRT_DTTM,
  NULL as TAX_RPTG_CTRY_RGN,
  NULL as TAX_ON_SLS,
  CAST(TRIM(f4311_adt.pdurec) AS DECIMAL(18,4)) as STK_TFR_RECV_QTY,
NULL AS CONCAT_OF_EBELN_AND_EBELP,                    
NULL AS ORIG_OF_PRCHSNG_DOC_ITM,
NULL AS PRCHSNG_DOC_ITM_CHG_DTTM,
NULL AS SHRT_TEXT,
NULL AS MATL_NUM1,
NULL AS MATL_GRP,
NULL AS NUM_OF_PRCHSNG_INFO_REC,
NULL AS TRGT_QTY,
NULL AS NUMRTR_CONV_ORDR_PRC_UNIT,
NULL AS DENOM_CONV_ORDR_PRC_UNIT,
NULL AS DEAD_FOR_SBMN_OF_BID,
NULL AS GOODS_RCPT_PRCSG_TIME_IN_DAYS,
NULL AS TAX_RT_VLD_FROM_DTTM,
NULL AS DETRMNG_TAX_RT_DTTM,            
NULL AS SETLM_GRP_1,
NULL AS UPDT_INFO_REC_IN,
NULL AS PRC_PRINTOUT,
NULL AS EST_PRC_IN,
NULL AS NUM_OF_REMNDR_EXPDTR,
NULL AS NUM_OF_DAYS_FST_REMNDR,
NULL AS NUM_OF_DAYS_SEC_REMNDR,                     
NULL AS NUM_OF_DAYS_THIRD_RMNDR,                    
NULL AS OVRDELV_TLRNC,                               
NULL AS UNLMTD_OVRDELV_ALLW,                       
NULL AS UNDRDELV_TLRNC,                              
NULL AS VALUT_TYPE,
NULL AS VALUT_CAT,
NULL AS REJ_IN,
NULL AS INTRNL_COMT_ON_QUTN,
NULL AS FNL_INVC_IN,
NULL AS CNSMPTN_PSTNG,
NULL AS DSTN_IN_FOR_MLT_ACCT_ASGNMT,
NULL AS PRTL_INVC_IN,
NULL AS GOODS_RCPT_IN,
NULL AS GOODS_RCPT_NVALUATED,
NULL AS INVC_RCPT_IN,
NULL AS GR_BAS_INVC_VERIF_IN,
NULL AS ORDR_ACK_REQ,
NULL AS ORDR_ACK_NUM,
NULL AS AGR_CUM_QTY_RCNL_DTTM,
NULL AS AGR_CUM_QTY,
NULL AS FIRM_ZN,
NULL AS TRADE_OFF_ZN,
NULL AS FIRM_TRADE_OFF_ZN,
NULL AS EXCLN_IN_OUTLINE_AGMT_ITM,
NULL AS SHIPPING_INSTR,
NULL AS TRGT_VAL_FOR_OUTLINE_AGMT,
NULL AS NDEDT_INP_TAX,
NULL AS STD_RLSE_ORDR_QTY,
NULL AS PRC_DTRMN_DTTM,
NULL AS PRCHSNG_DOC_CAT,
NULL AS EFF_VAL_OF_ITM,
NULL AS ITM_AFFCT_CMMT,
NULL AS COND_GRP_WTH_SUP,
NULL AS ITM_DONT_QUAL_FOR_CASH_DISC,
NULL AS UPDT_GRP_FOR_STATS_UPDT,
NULL AS NET_WT,
NULL AS UNIT_OF_WT,
NULL AS TAX_JURIS,
NULL AS PRT_RLVNT_SCHED_LIN_EXIST,
NULL AS SETLM_RESV_NUM,
NULL AS ITM_NUM_OF_THE_SETLM_RESV,
NULL AS QUAL_INSP_IN_CNNOT_BE_CHG,
NULL AS CNTL_KEY_FOR_QUAL_MGMT,
NULL AS INTNL_ARTCL_NUM,
NULL AS PRFT_CTR,
NULL AS GRS_WT,
NULL AS VOL,
NULL AS VOL_UNIT,
NULL AS PKG_NUM,
NULL AS CUR_NOT_USED,
NULL AS HI_LVL_ITM_IN_PRCHSNG_DOC,
NULL AS LTST_POSBL_GOODS_RCPT,
NULL AS CNFG,
NULL AS EVAL_RCPT_SETLM,
NULL AS GR_BAS_SETLM_STRT_DTTM,
NULL AS LAST_XMSN,
NULL AS SEQ_NUM,
NULL AS ALLC_TBL_ITM,
NULL AS NUM_OF_PT,
NULL AS MATL_LDGR_ACT_AT_MATL_LVL,
NULL AS MIN_RMN_SHLF_LIF,
NULL AS ITM_NUM_OF_RFQ,
NULL AS MATL_TYPE,
NULL AS SBTOT_1_FROM_PRC_PCDR,                       
NULL AS SBTOT_2_FROM_PRC_PCDR,                       
NULL AS SBTOT_3_FROM_PRC_PCDR,                       
NULL AS SBTOT_4_FROM_PRC_PCDR,                       
NULL AS SBTOT_5_FROM_PRC_PCDR,                       
NULL AS SBTOT_6_FROM_PRC_PCDR,                       
NULL AS PRCSG_KEY_FOR_SUB_ITM,                       
NULL AS MAX_CUM_MATL_GO_AHEAD_QTY ,                  
NULL AS MAX_CUM_PRDTN_GO_AHEAD_QTY,                 
NULL AS RTRN_ITM,
NULL AS DELV_TYPE_FOR_RTRN_TO_SUP,
NULL AS NEXT_FCST_DELV_SCHED_XMSN,
NULL AS NEXT_JIT_DELV_SCHED_XMSN,
NULL AS VALUT_OF_SPL_STK,
NULL AS REBT_BASIS_1,
NULL AS INFLT_INDX_DTTM,
NULL AS NM_OF_REQSNR1,
NULL AS TIME_ZN_OF_RCPNT_LOC1,
NULL AS MRP_AREA,
NULL AS DOC_ITM,
NULL AS WRK_BRKDWN_STRC_ELMNT1,
NULL AS REQ_URGNCY,
NULL AS REQ_PRIR,
NULL AS CRM_SLS_ORDR_ITM_NUM,
NULL AS CUM_GOODS_RECIPT,
NULL AS NUM_OF_SER_NUM,
NULL AS EXTRNL_SRT_NUM,
NULL AS RETN_IN_PCT,
NULL AS DOWN_PMT_PCT,
NULL AS DOWN_PMT_AMT_IN_DOC_CRNCY,
NULL AS DOWN_PMT_DUE_DTTM,
NULL AS CENT_CNTRC_ITM_NUM,
NULL AS INCO_LOC_1_PLACE_OF_DEST,
NULL AS INCO_LOC_2_PLACE_OF_DELV,
NULL AS INCO_DEVT_PLACE_OF_DEST,
NULL AS STAT_VAL_FOR_FRGN_TRD,
NULL AS PROD_TYPE_GRP,
NULL AS ITM_NUM_FOR_RQST_FOR_QUTN,
NULL AS TRGT_VAL_AT_ITM_LVL_IN_PRCM,
NULL AS EXPTD_VAL_OF_OVRL_LMT,
NULL AS OVRL_LMT,
NULL AS WKA_WRK_PER_STRT_DTTM,
NULL AS WKA_WRK_PER_END_DTTM,
NULL AS WKA_PCT_OF_WG,
NULL AS WRK_TIME_IN_HRS,
NULL AS DATA_FIL_VAL_FOR_DATA_AGE,
NULL AS CMT_QTY,
NULL AS HI_LVL_ITM_IN_PRTL_QTY_REJ,
NULL AS ANNXNG_PKG_KEY,
NULL AS EXTD_KEY_FOR_ANNXNG_PKG,
NULL AS BASE_DTTM,
NULL AS ANNXNG_DT_TYPE,
NULL AS ANNXNG_STRT_DTTM,
NULL AS DEVT_PCT,
NULL AS QUTN_ITM_NUM,
NULL AS DELV_PRIR,
NULL AS SLS_DOC_ITM,
NULL AS VEND_CNFRM_TYPE,
NULL AS DOC_DTTM,
NULL AS ARUN_ORDR_PRIR,
NULL AS WRK_BRKDWN_STRC_ELMNT2,
NULL AS RSN_FOR_ORD
FROM
  {Config.sourceDatabase}.f4311_adt
WHERE
  f4311_adt._deleted_ = 'F'  
 
""")
